analysis.purpose: To acknowledge receipt of Epstein's email containing a link to a Guardian article about Donald Trump sexual assault lawsuits

details: Reference to The Guardian article about Donald Trump sexual assault lawsuits involving Norm Lubow

analysis.summary: Michael Miller acknowledges Jeffrey Epstein's email containing a link to a Guardian article about Donald Trump sexual assault lawsuits, showing Epstein monitoring and sharing media coverage of sexual assault allegations with his legal team.
